EmailTemplate.description: Used for Trekbin to notify of feedback record creation
EmailTemplate.name: 10K Feedback Bug
EmailTemplate.subject: CORRECTION: 10K Feedback Bug
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
On August 3rd we noticed a bug in the Expert to Expert Feedback record creation.
Many of you may have received a notification to complete feedback incorrectly.
If you have received a request that doesn't apply, please ignore it.
We apologize for this mistake. Please let us know if you have any questions.
Thanks, Jared
